name: Trapeze
long_description:
Trapeze empowers doctors to answer patient calls 24/7 with our voice agents clones of their best call center reps and receptionists. In the past 3 months, weâ€™ve onboarded 140+ doctors nationwide serving 1,000,000+ patients.

We're building the AI-native Zocdoc to create the standard for how patients and providers find each other.

Follow along on the BTS of our journey: https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZTjQyxEQx/
